name: Retro Basketball Coach 2022
description:
Retro Basketball Coach is back for 2022 and bigger than ever! Building on last year’s critically acclaimed game; you can now have one last dance with mid-90s rosters, or play with squads from the current season. That’s two games in one, and all this on top of a brand new 2D match engine to bring to life those epic encounters - whichever era you choose!

Coaching has never been so simple - just trade players, manage your lineup and coach your team to a championship title! Retro Basketball Coach 2022 puts you in charge of your favourite city as you try and take your team to the play offs and a shot at winning the finals.

Simple menus allow you to focus on picking your best five players and checking their energy levels to make sure you keep your lineup fresh. Coach an entire game in a few minutes, and if your team isn’t up to the challenge then you can trade your way to your own ‘all star’ team in pursuit of success!

Complete with stylish player faces for every team, every basketball fan can experience the joy of guiding their team to finals glory!

- New 2D Match Engine
- Mid-90s Classic Rosters
- 2022 Season Rosters
- Trade System
- Stylish retro visuals
- Fun, fast basketball coaching!
